name: Lizard Labs: Infinite Artifacts
description: Scale to the pinnacle into the world of Lizard Labs with Infinite Artifacts, a collection of mysterious virtual items steeped in lore. These prized possessions are essential to the fabric of the Infinite Nexus, waiting to be discovered through feats of skill, cunning, and fortune. Destinies will be shaped and mysteries unraveled as the true story of the Infinite Nexus is revealed by the holders of the Artifacts.
